steps.command: cd {{$home}} && if [ -d 'output' ]; then tar -czf output_backup_$(date +%s).tar.gz output/ 2>/dev/null || true; fi && echo 'Backup created'
cd {{$home}} && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
echo 'âœ… Reset complete! Run install.json to set up again.'
